text: Hi, I am trying to see if a contact is subscribed or not to the blog but I have no success on what parameter should I get to make the verification if is subscribed or not from the 'Developer Info', I tried this {{contact.lifecycle_stage}} but nothing is showing. Am I doing something wrong or this is not the correct parameter to check if the person who landed on the blog is subscribed or not?
Interesting Question: Is the "Topic Description" available when building in HubL and using a topic_list for a blog post?
I know you get .name and .slug but is there some un-documented "description" field that pulls from the blog topics API ?

Hi, im new to designing websites with HubSpot. Trying to find out if there a way to get the advanced menu into a template using hubl where I can wrap my own classes (Bootstrap 4) around each element? i.e - use bootstrap classes to wrap individual page links.
